#include<cstdio>
inline bool chk(int a,int b)
{
while(a>0)
{
if(a%10==b)
return false;
a/=10;
}
return true;
}
int main()
{
int t,n,l,count=0,upper;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
count=0;
scanf("%d%d",&n,&l);
for(int i=0;i<=n;++i)
{
if(!chk(i,l))
++count;
}
upper=n+1;
while(count!=0)
{
if(chk(upper,l))
--count;
++upper;
}
printf("%d\n",upper-1);
}


return 0;
}
